p: However, some disposable bioreactors have cultivation containers that can be used more than once and are called disposable multi-usable bioreactors [ 173, 174]. Compared to single-use containers, disposable multi-usable versions are more complex and more time-consuming to work with, but they are cheaper to purchase [ 162]. Both multi-usuable and single-use disposable bioreactor types have been used to grow plant cell suspension, hairy root, and embryogenic cultures [ 24, 174, 175].
